name: Harold's Quest
description:
[Made for Human's "Enter the Haroldverse Jam!"]

Play as Harold as he finds himself in an unfamiliar land without his team. Despite them being jerks, they're still your friends so set off to find them. 

Credit to Yanfly, GALV and Moghunter. With music dubbed "8-bit Perfect Collection"

This jam was used to test an artstyle I've been messing around with for awhile now!
